message: Given the different inflation rates affecting us, this is a fair split that benefits us both more than further delays would.
With your value decreasing at 20% per round versus my 5%, this split actually gives you more real value than you'd get from further delays. Let's conclude this now before further devaluation.
Still willing to compromise, but need a fairer split

Consider that your share is already worth less than $150K in real value to you due to your 59% devaluation. This offer, if accepted now, would give you more real value than a larger share would be worth after further rounds of 20% devaluation. Let's conclude this now.
